channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Learning to read C++ compiler errors: Not a legal base class】学习阅读C ++编译器错误：不是法律基础类
item.description: 【A colleague was trying to create a Windows Runtime delegate with WRL. Here's a simplified version of what they wrote. namespace ABI { using namespace ABI::Windows::UI::ViewManagement; } struct MyClass : Microsoft::WRL::RuntimeClass<⟦...⟧> { HRESULT OnInputPaneShowing(ABI::InputPane* sender,】一位同事试图与WRL创建Windows Runtime委托。这是他们写的简化版本。命名空间ABI {使用名称空间ABI :: Windows :: UI :: ViewManagement; } struct myClass：Microsoft :: WRL :: runtimeclass <⟦...⟧> {hresult onInputPaneshowing（abi :: inputpane* sender，sender，

item.title: 【AI-Assisted Development powered by Local Models】由本地模型提供支持的AI辅助开发
item.description: 【Developers have long struggled with concerns about data privacy, restrictive cloud dependencies, and limited control over their AI tools—especially when working on sensitive projects or within regulated industries. Now, with the excitement surrounding local models, you can harness AI directly on your device, ensuring your data stays private】长期以来，开发人员一直在担心数据隐私，限制性云依赖性以及对其AI工具的控制有限，尤其是在从事敏感项目或受监管行业内部工作时。现在，有了围绕当地模型的兴奋，您可以直接在设备上利用AI，确保数据保持私密

item.title: 【The new GitHub app for Teams: from conversation to code】新的GitHub应用程序：从对话到代码
item.description: 【Meet the reimagined GitHub app for Teams: an AI-powered app to collaborate with GitHub Copilot right inside your Teams conversations. This initial release focuses on the Copilot coding agent, which was built to translate conversations into code and pull requests. This is the first step toward bringing the full power】与重新构想的GITHUB应用程序相遇：一个由AI驱动的应用程序，可与团队对话中的Github Copilot合作。此初始版本的重点是副本编码代理，该代理旨在将对话转化为代码和拉出请求。这是带来全力的第一步

item.title: 【Can I close a duplicate handle while I'm waiting on the original?】在等待原件时，我可以关闭重复的手柄吗？

item.title: 【How can I get my shell thumbnail extractors to run in the same process?】如何在同一过程中让我的壳缩略图提取器运行？
item.description: 【We learned that Explorer uses the COM Surrogate as a sacrificial process when hosting thumbnail extraction plug-ins. A customer had a thumbnail extraction plug-in for which prepar】我们了解到，在托管缩略图提取插件时，Explorer使用COM代理作为牺牲过程。客户有一个缩略图提取插件

item.title: 【Record Scanner for vinyl collectors cuts costs with Azure Cosmos DB vector search】乙烯基收集器的记录扫描仪通过Azure Cosmos DB矢量搜索降低成本
item.description: 【by Artur Drozdz, Founder of Record Scanner (recordscanner.com) If you’re like me, there’s at least one room in your home with an entire cabinet dedicated to your growing vinyl collection. At this point, you’ve probably heard that vinyl is making a comeback, it’s not just vintage anymo】作者：Record Scanner（RecordScanner.com）的创始人Artur Drozdz，如果您像我一样，您家中至少有一个房间，整个橱柜都专门用于您不断增长的乙烯基收藏。在这一点上，您可能已经听说乙烯基正在卷土重来，而不仅仅是老式Anymo

item.title: 【Getting the most out of MCP in Visual Studio with Prompts, Resources, and Sampling】通过提示，资源和采样
item.description: 【We're excited to announce that Visual Studio now supports MCP prompts, resources, and sampling (with even more coming soon!) to enhance your Copilot experience by bringing in more context from your engineering stack. These powerful new features unlock deeper integrations with your favorite tools and services, making your development workflow m】我们很高兴地宣布，Visual Studio现在支持MCP提示，资源和采样（即将推出更多！），以通过从工程堆栈中获得更多背景来增强您的副作用体验。这些强大的新功能与您喜欢的工具和服务取得了更深的集成，使您的开发工作流程M

item.title: 【Prompt Files and Instructions Files Explained】提示文件和说明文件解释了
item.description: 【GitHub Copilot is transforming the way developers write code by acting as an intelligent coding agent directly in your editor. Whether you’re building ASP.NET web applications, working with C#, or reviewing code with your team, Copilot can help automate repetitive tasks, suggest entire functions, and streamline code reviews. In this guide, w】Github Copilot正在通过直接在编辑器中充当智能编码代理来改变开发人员编写代码的方式。无论您是构建ASP.NET Web应用程序，使用C＃还是与您的团队一起查看代码，Copilot都可以帮助自动化重复任务，建议整个功能并简化代码评论。在本指南中，W

item.title: 【SQL Server 2025 RC1: faster DiskANN and FP16 support】SQL Server 2025 RC1：更快的Diskann和FP16支持
item.description: 【We’re excited to announce major improvements to DiskANN in SQL Server 2025 RC1, making vector search faster, more scalable, and more storage-efficient than ever before. ⚡ Significantly Faster Index Builds Building DiskANN indexes is now considerably faster, thanks to】我们很高兴地宣布SQL Server 2025 RC1中Diskann的重大改进，使矢量搜索比以往任何时候都更快，更可扩展和更有效率。 ⚡明显更快的索引构建建筑物diskann索引现在要快得多，这要归功于

item.title: 【MSSQL Extension for VS Code: Fabric Integration and GitHub Copilot Slash Commands (Public Preview)】VS代码的MSSQL扩展名：Fabric Integration和GitHub Copilot Slash命令（公共预览）
